title: PMS 2.0 759 - Everything DB With Darius Butler LIVE From The ThunderDome, & AJ Hawk
description: On today's show, Pat, Darius Butler, AJ Hawk, and the boys chat about everything happening around the NFL as we prepare for tomorrow night's colossal clash on Thursday Night Football between the Commanders and Bears, plus they dive into all the interesting news stories floating around the league as we approach week 6 of the NFL season before Darius breaks down the best and worse DB plays of the week in this installment of Everything DB. Make sure you subscribe to youtube.com/thepatmcafeeshow to watch the show. We appreciate the hell out of all you. See you tomorrow, cheers.
dc:creator: Pat McAfee
